snippet: We gathered a list of the best election-related Web sites for teachers and organized them by category. Have your students play fantasy election games or find pen pals in a different part of the country to exchange ideas about important issues.
abstract: We gathered a list of the best election-related Web sites for teachers and organized them by category. Have your students play fantasy election games or find pen pals in a different part of the country to exchange ideas about important issues.

headline.main: Great Free Web Sites for Teaching Election 2012
